## `AddTest`

Adds a test to the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean AddTest(Test testID)

boolean AddTest(string testName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`Test`](#test)/`string` testID | The test to add. (For a custom test, use the name of the test.) |

### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

`true` if the test was successfully added; otherwise, `false`.

### Example\index{Examples!adding tests} {-}

``` {.lua}
-- Opens a document from user's "Documents" folder
-- and adds some tests.
consentForm = StandardProject(Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Documents) ..
                              "Consent Form.docx")

consentForm:AddTest(Tests.DanielsonBryan1)
consentForm:AddTest(Tests.DanielsonBryan2)
-- assuming we have a custom test by this name.
consentForm:AddTest("Patient Consent Formula")
```
